svg.script: var curXScale = 3; function sample() { var g = document.getElementById("g"); g.setAttribute("transform", "scale(" + curXScale + " 1)"); if (curXScale > 1) { curXScale -= 0.1; setTimeout("sample()", 1); } else { document.documentElement.removeAttribute('class'); } } document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", sample, false); setTimeout(sample, 4000); // fallback for running outside reftest
